api/Global.ReactiveProperty-1.html.keywords: Class ReactiveProperty<T> Inheritance Object ReactiveProperty<T> Implements ISubject <T> Namespace : Global Assembly : cs.temp.dll.dll Syntax public class ReactiveProperty<T> : ISubject<T> Type Parameters Name Description T Properties Value Getter and setter for ReactiveProperty values Declaration public T Value { get; set; } Property Value Type Description T Get returns the value. Set checks if T values are equal and if not it sets the new value and notifies observer Methods Attach(IObserver<T>) Subscription management method for attaching observer Declaration public void Attach(IObserver<T> observer) Parameters Type Name Description IObserver <T> observer For adding observer Detach(IObserver<T>) Subscription management method for detaching observer Declaration public void Detach(IObserver<T> observer) Parameters Type Name Description IObserver <T> observer For removing observer Notify() Trigger an SubjectChange in each subscribed observer Declaration public void Notify() Operators Implicit(T to ReactiveProperty<T>) Returns value of the new ReactiveProperty Declaration public static implicit operator ReactiveProperty<T>(T value) Parameters Type Name Description T value Value as the parameter for making a new ReactiveProperty with given value Returns Type Description ReactiveProperty <T> New value of the reactive property Implicit(ReactiveProperty<T> to T) Returns value of the ReactiveProperty Declaration public static implicit operator T(ReactiveProperty<T> value) Parameters Type Name Description ReactiveProperty <T> value ReactiveProperty as the parameter for getting its value Returns Type Description T Value of the reactive property Implements ISubject<T>
